text: The Men's 60 kg competition at the 2019 World Judo Championships was held on 25 August 2019.Schedule ==Results== ===Finals=== ===Repechage=== ===Pool A=== ;Preliminary round {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font- size:90% " ! align="right" width="170"| !width="60"|Score !align="left" width="140"| |- |align=right|Yang Yung-wei |align=center|01–00 |align=left| Ashley McKenzie |- |align=right|Lukhumi Chkhvimiani |align=center|11–00 |align=left| Lai Yiu Long |- |align=right|Artem Lesiuk |align=center|10–00 |align=left| Moussa Diop |} ===Pool B=== ;Preliminary round {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90% " ! align="right" width="130"| !width="60"|Score !align="left" width="130"| |- |align=right|Kim Won-jin |align=center|10–00 |align=left| Abdou Nazir Bin |- |align=right|Steven Morocho |align=center|00–10 |align=left| Elios Manzi |} ===Pool C=== ;Preliminary round {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90% " ! align="right" width="130"| !width="60"|Score !align="left" width="130"| |- |align=right|Edwin Sello |align=center|00–10 |align=left|'''''' |- |align=right|Csaba Szabó |align=center|10–00 |align=left| |} ===Pool D=== ;Preliminary round {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90% " ! align="right" width="130"| !width="60"|Score !align="left" width="130"| |- |align=right|Julio Molina |align=center|00–10 |align=left|'''''' |- |align=right|Yann Siccardi |align=center|10–00 |align=left| Miguel Pisco |- |align=right|Andrew Phiri |align=center|10–00 |align=left| Issac Croes |} ==References== ==External links== *Draw Men's 60 kg
title: 2019 World Judo Championships – Men's 60 kg
